Could not open the screensaver settings on this device. You can use the following steps to enable the screensaver:

 1. Enable development mode on the device (click the build number or 'Android TV OS Build' 7 times in the System->About settings).
 2. Go to System -> Developer Options and enable USB Debugging
 3. If you don't have ADB installed on your PC, follow these instructions: https://www.xda-developers.com/install-adb-windows-macos-linux/ 4. After downloading/installing ADB on the PC, connect to the device using it's IP: 'adb connect 192.168.xx.xx'.
 5. Once you are connected, execute the following command: 'adb shell settings put secure screensaver_components nl.giejay.android.tv.immich/.playback.ScreenSaverService'
 6. Done!.

You can also check the instructions on the GitHub page: https://github.com/giejay/Immich-Android-TV
